name: Adala Kid !
description:
Adala Kid   Hello guys 

-An other little game that i made in my free time,

Skins:

-You can unlock 2 skins and 2 background if you are a very good player ;)

-You can choose the skin you want by just going in the skins menu

-     

controls: ControlswindowsJump  Space Barmove    right arrow, left arrow or A,DPause   P codes : 

-If you want the hidden codes, just tell me in the comments:)

advises:

-Recommended to play in full screen mode for quality optimization.

-If the first loading is too long try to refresh or try to close window that contains videos like YouTube (it worked for some guys).

-Too easy for you? Type "hardcore" in the code Menu ;) 

support:

-Don't forget to check credits section.

-If you want to support me, follow my twitter account:

https://twitter.com/Styl0o_ 

hope you will enjoy it :) -Styl0o_-
